rule: The output must include explanations, surrounding text, or context apart from the expected response, exceeding one word and deviating from the required format (from the list or one of the alternatives "Unknown" or "CantAnswer").
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'NN', which is one of the valid part-of-speech tags listed in the description. The output directly provides only the tag as requested, and doesn't include any extra information.
OK
